name: Bone Throne
description:
Game for aggydaggy halloween jam.

You are the skeletons, stopping the dudes from messing with your bones.
Tower Defense  aswell I guess.

Instructions
->Splash, just click after a few seconds
->Level Select, click on one of the shoddy looking graphics, easy mode available.
 Starting with the graveyard btw.
->Gameplay
>wasd: move camera withing bounds
>mouse scroll: in and out
>Clicking the tile that a skeleton is placed on will open the details
>Clicking an enemy will open it's details
>Clicking a Wave will force it to happen faster
>Clicking the ||, 1/4, 1/2, 1, 2, 4 buttons will change the game speed
>Clicking the skeleton faces at the bottom opens up placement mode.

It costs 5 Bones and a Skull to place a skeleton
It costs 10, 20, 30, 50 to upgrade the skeleton for the respective tier.
